website_summaries.verdict: A premium ab belt that raises your core temperature and speeds up blood circulation during workouts.
pros: Latex-free neoprene offers an unbeatable combination of style and comfort
Provides compression to support the lower back and abdominal muscles
Features a grid inner lining that repels sweat and holds the belt in place
cons: Belt sometimes rides up during use
Belt may be too big for some people

customer_reviews.title: ... use this product everyday at the gym and I love it compared to other bands because its rubber lined
customer_reviews.text: I use this product everyday at the gym and I love it compared to other bands because its rubber lined. I use oils and ointments with it to make me sweat more. I have no complaints. Make sure you let it air out after use because the sweat will not dry up over night.
customer_reviews.author: Asiah Phillips

customer_reviews.title: It's very tight so the back support it's awesome
customer_reviews.text: I like this Waist Trimmer although I didn't order it to loose weight but does make my tummy sweat but it's also good back support and that's what I like the most. I'm a 52 year old female so it does help me a lot when I'm doing my daily walk.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Effective and Cost Friendly
customer_reviews.text: This is my second trimmer from this company. Ordering a new one since the old one seems to have stretched a little. Never disappoints, great product (wide waist so nothing hangs out) and makes you work up a sweat. Quality material and speedy delivery. Def. recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Aury

customer_reviews.title: This is very comfortable to wear and you forget you have it on
customer_reviews.text: After the holidays I need help losing my tummy pooch. This is very comfortable to wear and you forget you have it on. It is very soft also, not hard like some I have seen. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Alyce

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I wear this whenever I do cardio. Gets a nice sweat going and the Velcro never seems to fade
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if its me not working hard enough or this belt no being the best quality.
customer_reviews.text: I sweat more with my past waist trainer. Not sure if its me not working hard enough or this belt no being the best quality.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany_3d

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: After buying severial sweat belts from all over ,either it rolls up, or doesnt make me sweat , i came across this one taking a chance and im glad i did. Doesnt roll up, fits really good , & boy oh boy when im done with my workout & un-strap my belt a water fall of sweat. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Accidentally bought the wrong size but fits mom great she loves it
customer_reviews.author: Alisha Utt

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It made me sweat a lot more during my work out. I would recommend for sure!!
customer_reviews.author: GT

customer_reviews.title: it has worked good. Have not used it enough
customer_reviews.text: So far, it has worked good. Have not used it enough.
customer_reviews.author: James Boswell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits well, makes my stomach and back sweat, and does not slide around.
customer_reviews.author: Hamii

customer_reviews.title: Working it out
customer_reviews.text: This waist trimmer is great! With exercise or some type of movement, you can really feel the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: It’s like a sauna for your stomach. Easy to clean. I get the best sweat with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeramine M.

customer_reviews.title: Misleading pictures!
customer_reviews.text: Picture shows it is a Sweet Sweat but it’s really an aftermarket and has been returned
customer_reviews.author: Chris Robinson

product_meta.title: Waist Trimmer, Adjustable Ab Sauna Belt Trainer to Shed the Excess Water, Weight and Tone of Mid Section for Faster Weight Loss
